automated_decision.label: automated_decision
automated_decision.text: Automated classifiers recommend actions to reviewers who have final authority over account decisions.

automated_decision.label: automated_decision
automated_decision.text: Our system flags transactions algorithmically, yet analysts authorize any blocking actions.

automated_decision.label: automated_decision
automated_decision.text: We employ algorithm-assisted decision-making where models inform rather than dictate outcomes.

automated_decision.label: automated_decision
automated_decision.text: We use semi-automated processes where algorithms recommend actions that staff may confirm or override.

automated_decision.label: automated_decision
automated_decision.text: Algorithms analyze behavior patterns to inform reviewers, who retain decision-making authority.

human_review.label: human_review
human_review.text: Decisions are made by our systems unless you exercise your right to request human review.

human_review.label: human_review
human_review.text: Your account may be subject to automated restrictions unless you request human review within 30 days.

human_review.label: human_review
human_review.text: Your access may be limited by automated systems, pending verification by our team.

human_review.label: human_review
human_review.text: We use AI for initial screening, but specialists conduct final assessments.

human_review.label: human_review
human_review.text: Preliminary assessments are made by AI, though final determinations may involve human judgment.
